participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is friendly and easygoing, often using casual language. He enjoys casual conversations and is comfortable with informal greetings.
participant_1.background: He grew up in a suburban area and often hangs out with friends in his free time, enjoying sports and music.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is outgoing and sociable, always ready to engage in fun conversations. He often uses humor and is very approachable.
participant_2.background: Having spent most of his life in a city, Liam enjoys the vibrant social scene and frequently attends local events.
